synopsis.text:
Its the 18th century, and a Holy War between the Goddess Athena and the Underworld King Hades has been waging for centuries, with the earth caught in the crossfire. In this era, three orphans - Tenma, Alone, and Sasha - shared a blissful childhood, vowing to reunite later in life. As fate would have it, Tenma becomes a Pegasus Saint, while Sasha is revealed to be the reincarnation of Athena. Meanwhile, Alone, a gifted painter, is chosen as the vessel for Hades.

As the story unfolds, Hades is on the brink of completing 'The Lost Canvas,' a massive painting that threatens to consume all life on Earth. Determined to save his friend and protect the world, Tenma embarks on a perilous journey to Hades' castle. Little does he know, this battle will intertwine the destinies of Pegasus, Hades, and Athena, setting the stage for the original Saint Seiya saga. Witness the unfolding of this epic prologue as friendships are tested, and loyalties are pushed to their limits.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
